title: Content Optimization Strategies
description: A library of resources to help you optimize your content using a mix of fundamental and advanced techniques.
content: OverviewIf you want to rank in Google, you need to publish amazing content. (And optimize that content for search engines.) The question is: How do you do it? Well, that’s what this section is all about. Here’s where you’ll learn how to create compelling content that people actually want to share and link to. You’ll also see exactly how to optimize that content using strategies that work in 2021. This page contains a library of resources to help you rank your content on the first page of Google.SEO WritingLearn exactly how to “write for SEO” with this simple, straightforward SEO writing guide. Explore this ResourceMeta DescriptionsLearn how to write meta descriptions that are SEO-friendly. And lead to more organic clicks. Explore this ResourceSEO Friendly URLsHow do you make sure that your URLs are SEO friendly? This detailed guide has you covered. Explore this ResourceInternal LinkingWhat is internal linking? And why is it important? Learn everything you need to know about internal links and SEO right here. Explore this ResourceSemantic SEOWhat is Semantic SEO? And how do you use it? I’ll show you how to tap into Semantic SEO in this detailed guide. Explore this ResourceRich SnippetsWhat are Rich Snippets? And how do you get them? Learn the ins and outs of Rich Snippets right here. Explore this ResourceLSI KeywordsWhat are LSI keywords? And how do you use them? I show you everything you need to know about LSI keywords in this super detailed post. Explore this ResourceFeatured SnippetsEverything you need to know about Feature Snippets, including strategies to rank in the “Position #0” spot. Explore this Resource
